channel.title: iphone on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in iphone on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Get a big voice memo off my iPhone
item.description: ##11:11 Monday 24 November 2014 JST## Visit https://www.macroplant.com/iexplorer/ Click Download Open the .dmg file Click, drag, and drop the left icon onto the right one. Click continue with demo Click voice memos Select the memo(s) you want to download click [Export seleced item(s) to folder…] Download the file somewhere The file will have a green checkmark once it has been transferred.
